page.title: 10TOURISM (DISADVANTAGES)
page.content: Jobs created seem few,seasonal wardens for caravan & camping site,hotel work seasonal,students & school girls in shops. Summer population stretches resources & doctors surgeries. Second homes provide revenue through rates but not always direct benefit to the immediate area. As we have 73% holiday or second homes,lived in from Easter,mainly week-ends & school holidays. After Sept.it becomes like a ghost village. Problems too in the bay with water ski-ing,speed boats,wind surfers, fishing boats ,yachts &fishermen with trout nets all wanting to be in the same area.
